title: Sitasaba
author: Sitasaba
content: Bitcoin seems to be taking a drop just before it reached its projected $100k high. This might be due to profit taking by some of the buyers. I was speculating this may just be a break and its value may continue soaring especially after Trump's swearing-in since he is crypto-friendly. He is also expected to introduce some crypto-friendly policies. Some have compared this drop to the 2021 one after Bitcoin gained value from $17k to an upwards of $64k urging buyers to avoid panicking.Do you think this is just a break or will the coin drop to lower lows as people may panic sell hoping to withdraw profits?

comments.author: john_egbert
comments.created_time: November 27, 2024, 08:18:05 AMLast edit: November 27, 2024, 10:17:23 AM by john_egbert
comments.body: I would say it's a small dip (p.s. not correction as I wrote previously, franky1 explained it better in the upcoming posts) before the real push would come and propel the price forward.The rally is still strong and the BTC DOM factor didn't fall that much.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: Sitasaba on November 27, 2024, 08:16:53 AMDo you think this is just a break or will the coin drop to lower lows as people may panic sell hoping to withdraw profits? It’s just a correction which a lot pf us had expected. But now lots of people would see the price going lower than they expected and start selling their coins then later on regret once they see bitcoin rallying back up again.This is not the way to be a good investor. If you aren’t a trader who wants to make profit by the volatility in each day or hour, I would suggest to stop analyzing each market movement and calm down. Don’t be impulsive and have some confidence.

comments.author: BitJannik
comments.body: It wouldn't be surprising if it rebounds especially with potential crypto-friendly policies from Trump.It's true that fear can lead to panic selling and that could push prices lowers in the short term.I think it's a wait-and-see situation, but long term, bitcoin's fundamentals still look strong.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: Sitasaba on November 27, 2024, 08:16:53 AMDo you think this is just a break or will the coin drop to lower lows as people may panic sell hoping to withdraw profits? It is already back in the move to the upside.. we wouldn't have expected price to keep moving in that direction without a retracement move back down. Though we had expected it to meet a psychological level, which is the $100k mark before coming to a significant level in down. Though some people already started selling around the 99k which we touch last week already.. just a 1k difference in price. The only thing I know right now is that it's not the right time to buy as price can dip anytime soon depending on any fundamental factors which may affect it..

comments.author: Ruttoshi
comments.body: Bitcoin correction is a norm and I was expecting it since the price pumped so fast in few days to $99,561 that was when I had the doubt that it will cross to 100k without price retracement. The current dip is for it to enable the price of bitcoin to advance farther into six digits and above.This is also another opportunity for those who was complaining that bitcoin price is high to buy bitcoin because it's clear that 100k price is sure. You shouldn't expect the price of bitcoin to be on uptrend alone so that you don't panic and sell when it's moving downtrend because the price will bounce back.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: It is crazy how the chart is repeating the same steps as that of November 2020, I dare you guys to look Bitcoin 2020 charts side by side with November 2024, you will be shocked. Even with all the buy pressure from MicroStrategy and BlackRock, this dips still repeat, this says a lot.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Bitcoin is down but that doesn't mean it is a drop although the price down is more than $6,000. You don't have to worry with the fluctuation of the price but use that for your own benefit so you will have a chance to accumulate more Bitcoin by buying at the low price. This down is just temporary and usually happen after the price hit the highest price so the price will increase again. Bitcoin will have a chance to increase so you don't have to panic with the situation. You need to calm down yourself and analyze the market for buying Bitcoin. If you can see when you can buy, you should buy it and hold it because we may not see the low price in the future.

comments.author: franky1
comments.created_time: November 27, 2024, 09:06:33 AMLast edit: November 27, 2024, 09:48:32 AM by franky1
comments.body: whats happening now is still in patternlook at the 2020 eventsprice exceeded the previous ATH(2017: $20k) during the 7th month and dipped a little at the [7th month] reached its 8th month DIP where the low was still higher than its previous ath.. before the beginning of the true bull of setting ultimate ATH in 2021 over a year after the halvingthe [box] shows 2020's Dec event which is this years equivalent to Nov (halving was earlier than previous)so the DIP will test and hit its low in december, and it will will be higher than previous ATH($70k).. before the beginning of the true bull of setting the ultimate ATH in 2025 ..if the pattern follows

comments.author: Smack That Ace
comments.body: Quote from: Sitasaba on November 27, 2024, 08:16:53 AMDo you think this is just a break or will the coin drop to lower lows as people may panic sell hoping to withdraw profits? Even though it is bull season, but we cannot expect bitcoin to rise vertically without any corrections. Bitcoin has been rising rapidly and reached $99k in a short time, so a correction is understandable. So every time bitcoin price corrects, we should see it as an opportunity to accumulate more bitcoins, not as a time to panic sell and have to buy back at a higher price later.I believe that if bitcoin doesn't pull back and break $100k, we will have a stronger correction after that because people will sell massively when bitcoin hits $100k. Because $100k is the sell target for most people, but with bitcoin pullback before hitting $100k, the selling pressure in the market will decrease significantly. Many people got scared and sold their bitcoins in the past few days but I am happy with the current situation and believe that bitcoin will soon surpass $100k without any correction after that, and those who sold will definitely have to FOMO and buy back at a higher price.

comments.author: fikrett
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on November 27, 2024, 09:06:33 AMwhats happening now is still in patternlook at the 2020 eventsprice exceeded the previous ATH(2017: $20k) during the 7th month and dipped a little at the [7th month] reached its 8th month DIP where the low was still higher than its previous ath.. before the beginning of the true bull of setting ultimate ATH in 2021 over a year after the halvingthe [box] shows 2020's Dec event which is this years equivalent to Nov (halving was earlier than previous)so the DIP will test and hit its low in december, and it will will be higher than previous ATH($70k).. before the beginning of the true bull of setting the ultimate ATH in 2025 ..if the pattern followsWe are in for the ride anyway, and I would say the pattern, albeit with some changes, would be applied there too.So we await correction and then see where the Bull would run with its horns.

comments.author: betswift
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on November 27, 2024, 08:46:18 AMIt is crazy how the chart is repeating the same steps as that of November 2020, I dare you guys to look Bitcoin 2020 charts side by side with November 2024, you will be shocked. Even with all the buy pressure from MicroStrategy and BlackRock, this dips still repeat, this says a lot. As Franky1 said - we are seeing the same story all over again, and we may believe in it  Then 2025 will be the biggest ATH for BTC for sure.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: Quote from: fikrett on November 27, 2024, 09:55:54 AMQuote from: franky1 on November 27, 2024, 09:06:33 AMwhats happening now is still in patternlook at the 2020 eventsprice exceeded the previous ATH(2017: $20k) during the 7th month and dipped a little at the [7th month] reached its 8th month DIP where the low was still higher than its previous ath.. before the beginning of the true bull of setting ultimate ATH in 2021 over a year after the halvingthe [box] shows 2020's Dec event which is this years equivalent to Nov (halving was earlier than previous)so the DIP will test and hit its low in december, and it will will be higher than previous ATH($70k).. before the beginning of the true bull of setting the ultimate ATH in 2025 ..if the pattern followsWe are in for the ride anyway, and I would say the pattern, albeit with some changes, would be applied there too.So we await correction and then see where the Bull would run with its horns. decembers low wont be a "correction" like the 2022 $15k was full low correction to the 2021 ath..this DIP is just a dip before then getting to 2025 ATHthe correction that really tests a new bottom wont happen until 2026this next month is just a dip. it wont go all the way down to pre november numbers (if the pattern follows)much like the 2020 chart shows that its end of year dip didnt go below $30k so it stayed above the previous ATH of $20kso following the pattern with this cycle. this cycles pre ATH dip this coming month wont go below $70k..

comments.author: BABY SHOES
comments.body: One would think whether this is the next fall or just a pause? I think it's natural for some people to ask because they expect a continuous rise... even though we know the market will not stay in the good area for long, there must be a correction pause to rally again, some investors will take profits immediately so it's natural.If you know how the market pattern is going forward, especially there is still a positive thing where when Trump is inaugurated in January, it can be a good signal for the price to rise again, there will definitely be a bounce again.Now people will buy a lot of coins again some of them take profits... just let them do what they do.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: Quote from: BABY SHOES on November 27, 2024, 10:12:35 AMIf you know how the market pattern is going forward, especially there is still a positive thing where when Trump is inaugurated in January, it can be a good signal for the price to rise again, there will definitely be a bounce again.Now people will buy a lot of coins again some of them take profits... just let them do what they do.i do laugh when people try to associate bitcoin price movements with celebrities social movementssorry to inform you but bitcoin is an independent economy.. it has its own features that help decide when price changes happen per cyclebitcoin did not ATH in 2021 due to elonbitcoin did not start moving this month due to trumpbitcoins 2025 ATH wont be due to trumpeveryone knows bitcoin ATH in 2025 will happen no matter who is president of america.. bitcoin economy is not controlled by US celebrity/politicsanyone trying to pretend trump will be the reason for the 2025 ATH is just silly, and trying too hard to give elon/trump false famebitcoins economic cycles are well known and tested multiple times. it has nothing to do with famous celebrities.

comments.author: john_egbert
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on November 27, 2024, 10:16:55 AMQuote from: BABY SHOES on November 27, 2024, 10:12:35 AMIf you know how the market pattern is going forward, especially there is still a positive thing where when Trump is inaugurated in January, it can be a good signal for the price to rise again, there will definitely be a bounce again.Now people will buy a lot of coins again some of them take profits... just let them do what they do.i do laugh when people try to associate bitcoin price movements with celebrities social movementssorry to inform you but bitcoin is an independent economy.. it has its own features that help decide when price changes happen per cyclebitcoin did not ATH in 2021 due to elonbitcoin did not start moving this month due to trumpbitcoins 2025 wont be due to trumpanyone trying to pretend trump will be the reason for the 2025 ath is just silly, and trying too hard to give elon/trump false famebitcoins economic cycles are well known and tested multiple times. it has nothing to do with famous celebrities.I would say that the news is the levers that propel cycles (which are more like technicalities) forward. They change the sentiment and make people think about what time it is, what's up with BTC, and what cycle we are in (though I do think people don't bother about that one at all when the price is growing steadily if they didn't live through multiple bull runs and analyzed them).

comments.author: fikrett
comments.body: Quote from: BABY SHOES on November 27, 2024, 10:12:35 AMOne would think whether this is the next fall or just a pause? I think it's natural for some people to ask because they expect a continuous rise... even though we know the market will not stay in the good area for long, there must be a correction pause to rally again, some investors will take profits immediately so it's natural.If you know how the market pattern is going forward, especially there is still a positive thing where when Trump is inaugurated in January, it can be a good signal for the price to rise again, there will definitely be a bounce again.Now people will buy a lot of coins again some of them take profits... just let them do what they do.It would be a good point for the sentiment, but the wheels are already in motion, as franky1 said.I do think they (cycles and the news) work in tandem with each other which results in a bull run.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: Quote from: john_egbert on November 27, 2024, 10:22:03 AMQuote from: franky1 on November 27, 2024, 10:16:55 AMQuote from: BABY SHOES on November 27, 2024, 10:12:35 AMIf you know how the market pattern is going forward, especially there is still a positive thing where when Trump is inaugurated in January, it can be a good signal for the price to rise again, there will definitely be a bounce again.Now people will buy a lot of coins again some of them take profits... just let them do what they do.i do laugh when people try to associate bitcoin price movements with celebrities social movementssorry to inform you but bitcoin is an independent economy.. it has its own features that help decide when price changes happen per cyclebitcoin did not ATH in 2021 due to elonbitcoin did not start moving this month due to trumpbitcoins 2025 wont be due to trumpanyone trying to pretend trump will be the reason for the 2025 ath is just silly, and trying too hard to give elon/trump false famebitcoins economic cycles are well known and tested multiple times. it has nothing to do with famous celebrities.I would say that the news is the levers that propel cycles (which are more like technicalities) forward. They change the sentiment and make people think about what time it is, what's up with BTC, and what cycle we are in (though I do think people don't bother about that one at all when the price is growing steadily if they didn't live through multiple bull runs and analyzed them).nahit is more like naive traders that dont understand bitcoin economics and bitcoin cycles, see the price move and then try to look for social/political news of that same time and try to think that it must have been the social/political event that caused it, because they dont know betterjust look at this dip happening now.. its the same pattern as the last cycle.. heck lets look at the previous one to thatthe 2016-17 events7 months after the 2016 halving the market found a new peak above the previous ATH then dipped in the 8th month.. then the climb to the 2017 ATH began..what you need to learn is that when people learn the patterns. by knowing the patterns people then act to make the most of the patterns which can make the scale of the peaks and dips change % growth/drop based on how much they take advantage of the pattern.. again its not based on silly social/media news of celebrities

comments.author: MusaMohamed
comments.body: Quote from: Sitasaba on November 27, 2024, 08:16:53 AMBitcoin seems to be taking a drop just before it reached its projected $100k high. This might be due to profit taking by some of the buyers.From $99k to $90k, it's about 10% correction, not too much if you know history of Bitcoin corrections.Bitcoin's historical corrections.QuoteSome have compared this drop to the 2021 one after Bitcoin gained value from $17k to an upwards of $64k urging buyers to avoid panicking.Buyers are FOMO, and sellers are panicking. Buyers never feel panicking when they enter Buy, and if any buyer panickly buys, it's a bet, not a purchase for investment or trading with diligent analysis.People are mostly FOMO now.https://www.bitcoinmagazinepro.com/charts/bitcoin-fear-and-greed-index/QuoteDo you think this is just a break or will the coin drop to lower lows as people may panic sell hoping to withdraw profits? It's a dip in a big bull run, and it's a great opportunity for you to buy dips and get profits in future by taking advantage of a bullish trend.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: $100k is a round and big number. That makes it a psychological resistance where people think it is a "ceiling" or a resistance. Which makes it into a resistance and because of the sell offs (where short term traders take profit) the price can't go past it. When we fail to break a resistance, the number of sales increase therefore price comes down more creating a "correction".It is just natural market dynamics.We had the same exact market behavior with $70k before this, but that one lasted longer and needed more attempts to break it.
